103 template <typename ALLOC>
104 size_t bitSizeOfString(const std::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, ALLOC>& stringValue)
105 {
106  const size_t stringSize = stringValue.size();
107 
108  // the string consists of varsize for size followed by the UTF-8 encoded string
109  return bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(stringSize)) + bytesToBits(stringSize);
110 }
111 
119 template <typename ALLOC>
120 size_t bitSizeOfBitBuffer(const BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>& bitBuffer)
121 {
122  const size_t bitBufferSize = bitBuffer.getBitSize();
123 
124  // bit buffer consists of varsize for bit size followed by the bits
125  return bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(bitBufferSize)) + bitBufferSize;
126 }
